Tricks.Name: Aging Trick
Tricks.Description: Ages the first person to touch the object

Tricks.Name: Animating Object
Tricks.Description: Animates, or it animates other objects nearby

Tricks.Name: Puzzle
Tricks.Description: Asks three skill-testing questions (if all three are answered correctly, a reward appears)

Tricks.Name: Bonus Resistance
Tricks.Description: Bestows resistance or vulnerability

Tricks.Name: Transmuter
Tricks.Description: Changes a character's alignment, personality, size, appearance, or sex when touched

Tricks.Name: Transmuter
Tricks.Description: Changes one substance to another, such as gold to lead or metal to brittle crystal

Tricks.Name: Protector
Tricks.Description: Creates a force field around the room exits

Tricks.Name: Illusion
Tricks.Description: Creates an illusion (DM choice)

Tricks.Name: Anti-Magic
Tricks.Description: Suppresses magic items for a time

Tricks.Name: Size Changer
Tricks.Description: Enlarges or reduces characters

Tricks.Name: Riddle
Tricks.Description: Speaks a riddle

Tricks.Name: Confusor
Tricks.Description: Causes Confusion to all creatures within 10ft

Tricks.Name: Director
Tricks.Description: Gives directions (true or false)

Tricks.Name: Wishing Well
Tricks.Description: Grants a wish

Tricks.Name: Flier
Tricks.Description: Flies about to avoid being touched

Tricks.Name: Geas
Tricks.Description: Casts Geas on the characters

Tricks.Name: Gravitron
Tricks.Description: Increases, reduces, negates or reverses gravity

Tricks.Name: Prison
Tricks.Description: Contains an imprisoned creature

Tricks.Name: Lock
Tricks.Description: Locks or unlocks exits

Tricks.Name: Gamer
Tricks.Description: Offers a game of chance, with the promise of a reward or valuable information

Tricks.Name: Helper
Tricks.Description: Helps certain types of creatures

Tricks.Name: Polymorpher
Tricks.Description: Casts polymorph on the characters (lasts 1 hour)

Tricks.Name: Puzzler
Tricks.Description: Presents a puzzle or riddle

Tricks.Name: Holder
Tricks.Description: Prevents movement

Tricks.Name: Treasure
Tricks.Description: Releases coins , false coins, gems, false gems, a magic item , or a map

Tricks.Name: Monster
Tricks.Description: Releases, summons, or turns into a monster

Tricks.Name: Suggestor
Tricks.Description: Casts suggestion on the characters

Tricks.Name: Wailer
Tricks.Description: Wails loudly when touched

Tricks.Name: Talker
Tricks.Description: Talks (normal speech, nonsense, poetry and rhymes, singing, spellcasting, or screaming)

Tricks.Name: Teleporter
Tricks.Description: Teleports characters to another place

Tricks.Name: Mind Swap
Tricks.Description: Swaps two or more characters' minds
